name: Camille Collins
text: Chicken Picatta wins. Comfortable seating, good atmosphere, under staffed service, free parking,nice ambiance, salads are not good in this location. Very skimpy, COBB is terrible, served with cold soggy bacon.

name: Anna Price
text: Get my avocades here weekly best rolls

name: Bxalec
text: This restaurant is very clean and the waiters and very friendly. It‚Äôs busy place. But the pizza is ready in less than 15 minutes, it‚Äôs really crunch and fresh. I definitely recommend this place. Plus is the best one around, the small pizza cost me $27 with two drinks.

name: Matt Romero
text: Over $14 for this? I‚Äôve made my share of bad purchases in my lifetime but this made me feel like an idiot. It‚Äôs not like it even tasted good. The worse part is it didn‚Äôt include the spinach or guacamole like advertised and they didn‚Äôt even say anything.

name: Frankie J
text: I give this California Pizza Kitchen five stars. This is always a crazy, busy location for the California Pizza Kitchen and thats because of all the delicious menu items. I've always been a fan of their KUNG PAO SPAGHETTI. Yum!!!! Add EXTRA peanuts 8- )

name: Josue Hernandez
text:
DO NOT GO
i found a cockroach in a pasta dish ordered for catering, as well as some more cockroaches on the pizza. ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING.

name: Devin Diaz
text:
"good for an airport, not good for the real world"

My brother ordered a margherita pizza and it's literally just a cheese pizza. My ‚Ä¶More

name: Alexis Taylor-ross
text: I love love love! The California Pizza Kitchen is amazing variety of different foods seasonings, my taste buds jump for joy. A little pricey but it's worth it. More of like a date night for two kind of dining experience fancy but fast.

name: James Burleson
text: It was approximately 15 minutes before my boarding time back to Dallas, TX, and I decided to sit at the bar for a quick bowl of Tortilla Soup. My server/bartender Guillermo D blew me away with his service. He was super courteous and ‚Ä¶More

name: Chase Sosa
text: Awesome foods and great staff! Thank you for your help! A five-stars satisfaction rating for you!

name: Kevin Adventures
text: If you got a little time ‚Äúflight delay‚Äù the pizza is worth the wait. Staff is friendly and service is good. So, order up a bloody mary and relax. ‚Ä¶More

name: M Wong
text: Wanted to eat something at the airport that wasn't a burger.  This was one of the few choices available.  It is right near gate 18.  The  food was just ok.. We ordered the bbq chicken pizza for $18.19USD.  It came out looking like a frozen ‚Ä¶More

name: karen ledford
text: Hungry and either at the airport early or have a delayed flight? Hop over to CPK for Kung Pao Spaghetti and margs! Best way to pass the time and ease the frustration of airport waiting. :)

name: Sheldon Murillo
text: California Pizza Kitchen is so very great. Foods are awesome and people! Love the place

name: L Cook
text: Unique and creative bookstore that sells used books.  Love how they draw attention to the books by stacking them a certain way to resemble an item.  No personal scooters allowed.  They were stroller friendly with my kids.  Must see the ‚Ä¶More

name: Omar V
text: Horrible service. Bought a water and took a seat to think about what they had on the menu and was kicked out for being in the dining area without ordering yet. Dang I really wanted some kind of üçï. But not now. The porter to be exact. 11/20/2019 1:04

name: Nunez Gerard
text:
My favorite place.  Just like the pizza in CA
Pizza is always good. Great atmosphere too.

name: Fatima Marrero
text: I haven't found better pizza yet. Believe it folks, the Pizza really is that good. It just is. So deal with it.

name: Gravy My Bacon
text: Good pizza made fast with attentive service. This CFP is in LAX so you can assume that it is busy. Even then it had great service and a relaxed environment, and the pizza was made fast but full of flavour. California Pizza Kitchen is far better than any normal chain pizza garbage, like Papa John's and/or Domino's.

name: Glen Dixon
text: Very nice server. Low key but open-air place. Limited menu options on food. Big drinks. A little pricey, but delicious.

name: YJ L
text:
The best French Toast I had ever tried before!!!

I was there in the early morning to wait for my transfer plane to Las Vegas.  I ‚Ä¶More

name: Serena Uible
text: Pizza was okay. I got plain cheese because I wasn't feeling great. Would have rather had breakfast, but got there too late ... By one minute. Seating is hard and uncomfortable. Service was okay. With tax and tip just over $20 for okay plain ‚Ä¶More

name: Boris Ilich
text: I think the next time I want to eat a pizza, you will not be in my choice list. I feel offended and insulted by the attitude of one of your waitresses who this afternoon 11/02/18 rudely asked me to remove me from a table because I'm not ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim McMahon
text: Best breakfast I ever had at an airport. Nice people. Perfectly prepared meal. OJ was fresh squeezed!

name: Alex Points
text: Rude employees and extremely overpriced mediocre food

name: Maria Lo
text: Very good

name: Jillian Wyatt
text: Best Pizza in the world! Little cute place with great food! Great taste and low price!

name: Stacy Ramirez
text: Overpriced. Food was okay but not worth the price. The wings are pretty good though!

name: Nikkhil Kumaar Banka
text: Loved the fresh salads, appetizer and pastas.

name: Pat rick M3
text: Got 2 pies  loved them

name: Nikki Isaac
text: I ordered a sonoma omelette with brioche and fruit instead of potatoes. The omelette was delicious and fluffy. I love the taste of basil and arugula. I like the smashed avocado although a little less would have been better. Overall, food was good but service was not good.

name: Benjamin Beckham
text: Waited at the front for 5 minutes, there was nobody to seat me, so I thought it was self seating. I sat down. Wondering where a server was for about 15 minutes. Finally a girl came over and said very cocky ‚ÄúExcuse me, were you seated by our ‚Ä¶More

name: Farnaz Falahati
text: Horrible customer service! No wonder they are going out of business. Paid $58 for our food they didn‚Äôt let us sit down. I have never seen this in my life. They almost kicked us put because we ordered to go first and then we decided to dine ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom M
text: 15$ for cold grab and go sandwich. Gtfo

name: Sarah Hart
text: Tried this place tonight for the first time and it was definitely a hit... We can't wait to come back! Salad and pizza was sooo yummy oh and free pitcher refills.

name: Greg Mau
text: The Shishito Peppers were excellent and the Chicken & Shrimp Cream Fettuccine had me wanting more!  Service was just enough to let you know that you were being taken care of.... perfect!

name: Matt ONeill
text: Outrageos prices.  Terrible service.  Not helpful.  Very annoying. Then they wouldn't let me stay at the table when my son went to the bathroom.   Was not at my table for 5 minutes after eating.  Unbelievable.  Won't ever eat at any California pizza again.  Complete jerks.

name: Tina B
text: Good food, good service

name: Dallas S.
text: $20 for a small personal sized pizza. They take advantage of the fact you can't bring food past security to such a gross extent, never seen food price gouging at an airport like this before, easily the worst case I've encountered. ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Sherer
text: Not cheap, but whether you just need to grab something to take on the plane or you have time for table-service, it's one of the best options in this terminal. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jose Arango
text:
Overstaffed. Employees stand around chit chatting.

Could increase revenue be more efficient and fire some of the dead weight.

name: Parker Mazal
text: It is a fair location. it is more pricy due to the fact that it's inside an airport, and it was very hard to find our waitress. The food was average.

name: Antwan Powels
text: Food and service was very good

name: Donnie Begay
text: 5 stars for the bar only. Very quick and friendly service at the bar.

name: Kevin Wright
text: I sat at the bar. Gentleman took 10 minutes to take my order. 10 minutes later he informed me the fryer was down and ask me if I would like something else. I could not get his attention for the next 10 minutes so I ask another bartender to ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy McCoy
text: Terrible, rude service. Stopped by at 7:05 PM on 5/5 to get coffee, but they would not serve any because they were "cleaning the machine".  I asked how long until they could serve again. I was able to see the timer on the espresso machine. The teller suggested I come back tomorrow.  Note that they don't close until 10pm.

name: DrinkMoreCoffee
text: I used to stop here many times a year when I fly out of LAX. However today I sat down at the bar which had always been open seating and was completely ignored by the five staff members who were behind the counter. After about five minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Griesman
text: Great service, nice bright environment, good food & decent wine.

name: Sean Taulman
text: One of the only things open at 4am in terminal one... Breakfast sandwich is 13$, which is ridiculous.. Service was decent, sandwich was okay.

name: Michael Bennett
text: customer service here sucked beyond belief. I'll never be back.

name: Patti Becker
text: I visited this facility for breakfast prior to boarding my flight. Not only was service slow, the food was cold when served, bread was toasted on one side only and the butter pat was hard.  While I ate most of the food since I didn't have ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Williams
text: Ridiculously overpriced even for an airport. $19 for a pepperoni pizza that had been sitting in a warmer for who knows how long but they did have the shortest line and were quick.

name: jeff zimmerman
text: Wait is forever and food was not that good.

name: Roman Hampton
text: Just ok. Far from perfect as for food quality/taste and service

name: J S
text: The breakfast sandwiches are made in advance. They are heat oven stale. It‚Äôs edible but not very memorable. Sometimes the lines can be unbelievably long. $12.00 for what amounts to an egg McMuffin.

name: Steven Johnston
text: Great food and service.

name: Richard Carapezza
text: Bad pizza over priced

name: Steven Comer
text: Good service and good food. Prices weren't too bad for an airport.

name: Ashley Machado
text: Ok the BBQ chicken pizza was very good and the service was as well, but the best part is how the employees treat each other. I have never seen a staff that gets along with each and is as kind to one another like this, and even as they get along, they continue to work diligently. Makes you feel realllll good :)

name: RoyLeeD333
text: We ate breakfast here on May 2nd..2017.  I sure wish I could remember the young mans' name who was our waiter, bc he was excellent.   Service was good, the breakfast sandwich exceeded my expectations..the price is a little high, but I expect that at LAX.  I will definitely go there again.

name: Alan Villasenor
text: Only because it's at the airport it's way overpriced for a medium pizza. 13 bucks will get you something that will get cold pretty soon and finish quickly. I work here so this was a desperate day where I was really hungry.

name: Logan Newman
text: Its inside an airport but the service and quality of the food was excellent. It was a lot better then buying a bunch of junk food and waiting at my terminal. Try it out!

name: O. Bass
text: South LAX location was to be open at 4am, at 4:40am still not open and I'm still in line. No other food place around... Everyone is scrambling and it dose not look like they know what to do. Very poor management. When I finally got to the ‚Ä¶More

name: Nooraldeen Aldrees
text: Horrible service , I wated for more  45 mins just for a margarita pizza . And they waiter didn't even care to apologize or show any customer service skills. After , waiting the same waiter came to me and asked if I was waititing for . Then ‚Ä¶More

name: Charles Brasby
text: This is in reference to the LAX location in the Southwest terminal, I am not sure who is managing this location but at 8:30am they are out of breakfast sandwiches and cannot make a regular pizza, which most people would not want, but it ‚Ä¶More

name: Jayson Ross
text: This Wagyu-Brisket Burger is a 5 Star Burger! I was not expecting much out of it, because I was in an airport, and how does CPK know how to cook burgers, but this Burger was amazing! Very flavorful, cooked to perfection! This is an awesome Burger!

name: Lenin Rincon
text: Good place to eat, a little pricey

name: Will Cobb
text: Overpriced and the quality was lacking. They know the people who eat there have no other choice so they take advantage I guess. Better than starving.

name: Mike B
text: Pizza was good service was slow

name: Gerlynn Fabian
text: Kindly instruct your staffs to practice courtesy all the time. Thank you.

name: Will Herold
text:
Service - quick and friendly. Breakfast.
Food:  scorched eggs , potatoes over cooked deep fried and mushy, toast served cold only toasted on one side.

name: Shaun Maxson
text: Very pricey and the food was not that great. I usually love CPK but this location was not great.

name: Jon Eganhouse
text: Tony and Javier took great care of me in the AM.  Hot coffee and good company - The Best!

name: John Silk
text: So so mostly white people with brats

name: Heather C
text: All pizzas were sold out at 2pm on a Friday. Had to wait 20 minutes for a small pizza. Unfortunately, this is one of few choices for hot food in this terminal.

name: Dave Payne
text: HORRID service. The breakfast sandwiches are premade and yet you stand in a 15-person line for 30 min for to go orders

name: James Lee
text: Great service. Every time I go Monica knows my drink and I'm only through there four times a year.

name: Gene Hand
text: Horrible service. Gave us wrong pizza. Then waited 20 minutes for another. And pizza sucked. Card board. Buy yourself a few candy bars instead. You wont be sorry

name: Vivek Dsilva

name: Kyle Johnson
text: $95.84 dollars for 4 little pizzas and 4 sodas...

name: Mike Zolna
text: Newly remodeled. Great food

text: The employees are absurdly rude! There was a woman named something like Lilian,  she doesn't know how to be kind I think.  It was frustrating!!!

name: Taylor W
text: I was here years ago waiting for a flight. It's different than the standard McDonalds type fare that is in most airports.

name: Ronald Heller
text: Hostess is rude and doesn't care to seat people who don't look like her..terrible customer service...

name: Kayden Thomson
text: Went for take out pizza. Received over priced, mediocre pizza and horribly slow service (30-45 minute wait).

name: Andrew Ciandella

text: INCURRED THREE FRAUDULENT CHARGES IN LESS THAN 24 HOURS AFTER LAST USING MY CREDIT CARD AT CPK AT LAX. CAN NOT SAY WHO DID IT. CREDIT CARD COMPANY INVESTIGATING THE SOURCE.
